import sys

def main():
    P, Q, R = map(int, input().split())
    print(min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

P, Q, R = map(int, input().split())

print(min(P + Q, Q + R, R + P))


N, K = map(int, input().split())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

h.sort()

ans = 100000000

for i in range(0, N-K+1):
    ans = min(ans, h[i+K-1]-h[i])

print(ans)
